_.comment: [CI-LOCKED] The content of this file is locked. Contributions are welcomed but it could be delayed as we conduct additional checks.
_CONNECTIVITY_STATUS_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 will be one of "CONNECTIVITY_STATUS_ALT_"*.
CONNECTIVITY_STATUS_ALT_RECONNECTING: 網絡暫時斷咗，試緊再駁返…
CONNECTIVITY_STATUS_ALT_RENDER_ERROR: Render 出事，請睇下 console 或者同 bot 開發人員聯絡。
_NOTIFICATION_ACCORDION_TWO.comment: $1 is the number of notifications. This is for plural rule of "two".
_NOTIFICATION_ACCORDION_FEW.comment: $1 is the number of notifications. This is for plural rule of "few".
_NOTIFICATION_ACCORDION_MANY.comment: $1 is the number of notifications. This is for plural rule of "many".
_NOTIFICATION_ACCORDION_OTHER.comment: $1 is the number of notifications. This is for plural rule of "other".
_NOTIFICATION_ALT_ERROR.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 is user-generated content, the actual notification message.
_NOTIFICATION_ALT_INFO.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 is user-generated content, the actual notification message.
_NOTIFICATION_ALT_SUCCESS.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 is user-generated content, the actual notification message.
_NOTIFICATION_ALT_WARN.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 is user-generated content, the actual notification message.
_NOTIFICATION_TITLE_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader. The label for individiual notification.
_ACTIVITY_BOT_SAID.comment: $1 is the initials for the bot (e.g. "JD"), and $2 is user-generated content, the actual message.
ACTIVITY_USER_SAID: 用家 $1 話：$2. 送出嘅時間：$3
_ACTIVITY_USER_SAID.comment: $1 is the initials for the user (e.g. "LC"), and $2 is user-generated content, the actual message.
_ACTIVITY_STATUS_SEND_FAILED_RETRY.comme: This is Markdown. Do not localize "[RETRY]" (the one in uppercase).
_ACTIVITY_STATUS_SEND_STATUS_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 will be one of "ACTIVITY_STATUS_SEND_STATUS_ALT_*".
_ACTIVITY_STATUS_SEND_STATUS_ALT_SENT_AT: $1 is the time when the message is successfully sent, in absolute format, e.g. 12:34 PM.
_SUGGESTED_ACTIONS_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader. $1 will be one of "SUGGESTED_ACTIONS_ALT_*".
_FILE_CONTENT_ALT.comment: $1 is the name of the file, e.g. document.docx. $2 is the file size, e.g. 12 MB
FILE_CONTENT_DOWNLOADABLE_WITH_SIZE_ALT: 下載檔案 '$1' 檔案大小 $2
_SPEECH_INPUT_MICROPHONE_BUTTON_OPEN_ALT: This is for screen reader and is the label of the microphone button, when clicked, will open microphone.
_SPEECH_INPUT_MICROPHONE_BUTTON_CLOSE_AL: This is for screen reader and is the label of the microphone button, when clicked, will close microphone.
_CAROUSEL_ATTACHMENTS_BOT_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader and is narrated before a list of attachments, sent by the bot.
_CAROUSEL_ATTACHMENTS_USER_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader and is narrated before a list of attachments, sent by the user.
_TYPING_INDICATOR_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for the label that will be narrated when the other party is typing a message.
_TEXT_INPUT_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for the label of the message input box.
_CAROUSEL_FLIPPER_LEFT_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for the label of the left flipper button for carousels.
_CAROUSEL_FLIPPER_RIGHT_ALT.comment: This is for screen reader for the label of the right flipper button for carousels.
